data.title: Upgrade v9.5 to V10 but cannot backup
data.meta_description: Veeam Community discussions and solutions for: Upgrade v9.5 to V10 but cannot backup of Veeam Backup & Replication
data.text:
Quote

Post by wisarut@9t.com » Mar 23, 2020 9:00 am this post

Hello, I upgrade Veeam from veeam 9.5 to V10 but I cannot backup.

Error: Unable to perform guest file system indexing: Microsoft Windows Server 2003 (Enterprise) guest OS type is not supported for indexing.

pls help and tell me for causes

Thank you.

Re: Upgrade v9.5 to V10 but cannot backup

Quote

Post by Vitaliy S. » Mar 23, 2020 9:30 am this post

Hello,

You need to disable file indexing in the guest OS settings of the backup job for VMs using Windows Server 2003.

Thank you!

Re: Upgrade v9.5 to V10 but cannot backup

Quote

Post by wisarut@9t.com » Mar 23, 2020 9:34 am this post

Why before upgrade it hasn't problem for indexing ?

Is Veeam V10 can't support Windows Server 2003 any more ?

Thank you.

Re: Upgrade v9.5 to V10 but cannot backup

Quote

Post by Vitaliy S. » Mar 23, 2020 9:57 am this post

Yes, application-aware processing and guest file system indexing is not supported for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP virtual machines. However, crash-consistent backup of such VMs will of course still be supported. If you still need to support this for legacy reasons, then staying with 9.5 U4 is the way to go.

Re: Upgrade v9.5 to V10 but cannot backup

Quote

Post by wishr » Mar 23, 2020 10:04 am this post

Hello,

Guest processing is not supported for Windows Server 2003 due to VSS limitations so you should disable it to make the job work.

Please note, that according to the forum rules you should include a support case ID in your post when posting about any technical issue. Any topic not having a case ID will be eventually removed by forum moderators.

Thanks

Re: Upgrade v9.5 to V10 but cannot backup

Quote

Post by mkaec » Mar 30, 2020 12:53 pm 2 people like this post

Windows Server 2003 went EOL 4.5 years ago. I think it's reasonable for Veeam to drop support in v10.

Re: Upgrade v9.5 to V10 but cannot backup

Quote

Post by William Bohn » Apr 16, 2020 9:17 pm this post

I am getting this error on VMs that aren't using 2003. Getting it on some 2019 VMs. Yet it mentions they are 2003 VMs which they are not

Re: Upgrade v9.5 to V10 but cannot backup

Post by veremin » Apr 16, 2020 9:41 pm this post

Definitely not expected, so, please, open a support ticket and post its number here. Thanks!
